attributes.action: Abolish current plans to create a huge database of internet, SMS and phone calls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I call on everyone opposed to this draconian measure to sign this petition.
This is invasion of privacy and is in direct violation of the Human Rights Act 1998 Article 8

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
